text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Agirda |native_name = |official_name = |settlement_type = |motto = |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |pushpin_map = Cyprus |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |pushpin_map_caption = Location in Cyprus |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = • District |subdivision_name1 = Kyrenia District |subdivision_type2 = Country |subdivision_name2 = |subdivision_type3 = • District |subdivision_name3 = Girne District |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |unit_pref =Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = |area_land_km2 = |area_metro_km2 = |population_as_of = 2011 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 745 |population_density_km2 = |timezone = EET |utc_offset = +2 |timezone_DST = EEST |utc_offset_DST = +3 |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Agirda (; ) is a village in the Kyrenia District of Cyprus. It is under the de facto control of Northern Cyprus. Its population in 2011 was 745. ==References== Category:Settlements in Cyprus
title: Agirda
